skills.name: Install AWS SDK v3
skills.pattern:
npm install @aws-sdk/client-s3
npm install @aws-sdk/client-dynamodb
npm install @aws-sdk/client-lambda

skills.name: Configure Credentials
skills.pattern:
// ~/.aws/credentials
[default]
aws_access_key_id = AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE
aws_secret_access_key = wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG

// Or environment variables
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
AWS_REGION

skills.name: S3 Upload
S3 Download
S3 List Objects
S3 Presigned URL
DynamoDB Put Item
DynamoDB Get Item
DynamoDB Query
DynamoDB Document Client

Lambda Handler

SNS Publish
Secrets Manager
Parameter Store
Cognito Auth
SES Send Email
CloudWatch Logs

RDS Connection

EventBridge Put Events
Step Functions
Bedrock Invoke Model
Kinesis Put Record
API Gateway Management
Athena Query
